title: Cowboys-Raiders, taking risks, Lakers, and the Herd hierarchy
itunes:title: Cowboys-Raiders, taking risks, Lakers, and the Herd hierarchy
description:
Colin discusses the trade between the Dallas Cowboys and the Oakland Raiders, and why Dallas did what had to be done, the importance of sometimes taking risks, why we shouldn't worry about the Los Angeles Lakers, and the Herd hierarchy. Guests include Russell Wilson, Chris Haynes, Peter King, and Trent Dilfer.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
